text:
I went to see this restaurant because it has Japanese talent😆
The male staff were also Japanese, so I missed the polite customer service!
I rarely use Japanese at my workplace, so I thought, ``I want to make a fuss in Japanese for the first time in a while!''
I was surprised that the level of the girls was higher than I expected! ️
Cast members like models and young actresses who are really active in fashion shows etc.
In Japan, I had never met a person who looked like a neat and clean office lady that I admired.
There was also a sexy magazine model style gal, so I had a lot of fun✨
I was given a clear accounting explanation, so I was able to extend my stay with confidence and thoroughly enjoyed it.
There are many private rooms where you can do karaoke and a smoking area, so it was the perfect place to satisfy my desires! We look forward to working with you in the future.
🎤🚬🔥

With friendly customer service
I enjoyed it
I will go again when I go to Singapore

There are 5 private rooms and you can enjoy karaoke.
(^_^)
I had a great time with the clean and friendly female staff.
